thread.section_title: Flologic Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Flologic | flologic.com
thread.title: Tom Commaroto

author: Tom Commaroto
title: Tom Commaroto
text: I started with Flologic when they first produced ver.1 over 10 yrs ago or so. I was looking for a water shutdown system for my home and I knew I saw something in Popular Science magazine about a start up company. After much searching I found them and made immediate contact. I was in constant contact with Chuck and Roger in the beginning. Installed my first system and after many months of good and bad experiences with the system and multiple installs, Ver.2 was released with major improvements. Chuck and Roger never let me down always answered my calls and swiftly responded to my needs or questions. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND the system, I believe every home and business needs one of these installed, I was a victim of severe water damage in a home before I found Flologic, never again will this happen to me
